amendment.description: At the end of division C (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Integrated Risk Information System of the Environmental Protection Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 165 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds for the Integrated Risk Information System of the Environmental Protection Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 275 (Roll no. 390).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 275 (Roll no. 390).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Biggs.
